t: WHITE,TONY JOE - Collected - Amazon.com Music
s: I haven't listened to Tony Joe White in a LOT of years. I recently rediscovered him all over again. What is really striking about this CD collection is the analog sound of these recordings. I have spent a fair amount of time as a studio engineer, and the audio quality of this one is exceptional.

t: Amazon.com: The Best of Tony Joe White: CDs & Vinyl
s: In the 60's, especially the latter part of the decade, all were welcome in the pop music world. The categorizing would come later when the suits took over radio. Tony Joe White came in on that wave with Polk Salad Annie, a curious song about a tough girl down in Louisiana.

My copy was left it a rental car in Canada whilst on vacation this year, so upset as I thought I may not get hold of it again Not only did I get it on time its brand new and a great price. s: I own every CD the man has ever ... original vinyl from the 1960s and 1970s that I treasure). While Tony Joe has consistently released top-notch material, I will go out on a limb here and say that, in my humble opinion, this may well be his very best CD ever.
